name: Natural Health Trends Corp.
description: Natural Health Trends Corp. is a global direct-selling company that specializes in premium wellness products and services. Founded in 1996, the company focuses on promoting health and wellness through innovative nutritional supplements, skincare products, and personal care items. NHTC operates primarily through its brand, 'Tianxi,' which offers a range of high-quality health and beauty products that are designed to enhance the overall well-being of its customers. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, NHTC has established a robust global distribution network that spans across various countries, allowing it to reach a diverse audience. The company places a strong emphasis on research and development, continuously striving to improve its product offerings and to stay ahead of market trends. NHTC also provides its independent sales representatives with comprehensive training and support to help them succeed in their business endeavors. The company is dedicated to fostering a culture of health and wellness, while also focusing on community engagement and social responsibility initiatives. NHTC's mission is to empower individuals to achieve their personal and financial goals through the sale of their innovative products, thereby promoting a healthier lifestyle globally.
